text_block_list.name: Academy Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Alright! I'm going to give it all for the race today. I don't get this sort of chance often, so this will be a good learning experience!

text_block_list.name: Academy Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: I won't lose either. This is a competition after all!

text_block_list.name: Academy Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: Huh!? What was that!? It's like the entire atmosphere felt heavier all of a sudden!

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Yup. This is looking to be perfect race weather. I'm feeling pretty good myself too.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: It's been a long time since I couldn't control my excitement for a race.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: This is a race where not only the horsegirls on the field will shine, but also future horsegirls as well. That sort of conviction makes my heart dance.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Ha ha. I guess this is the effect of making the pamphlet. It's okay to be a bit flashy today.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Rudolf! C.B.!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: I've been waiting for this day! I know this isn't an official race, but there's no way I can't not get this excited for a chance to go against you two.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Fufu. I see you've gotten quite into this, Ace.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Did you forget? It's my dream to become the "Ace" of the horsegirl world!! To have you two be my opponents will naturally get me fired up!

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: I like it. You two would make for the perfect opponents. … I'm getting excited for this myself.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: If we really came at each other seriously, I wonder what would happen. Let's go find out.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Wait, wait… That aura over there is insane. I'm already starting to sweat…

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Woahhhhh!! You can see the sparks crackling! I'm also going to try and make some sparks fly!!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Nature! I'm going to run with all I got! I don't care if this is a special race or who my opponents are!!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: No matter when or where, I will always be the one to take the lead! I'll prove to everyone that the strongest one out there is Turbo!!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: You really are something else, not even being a bit nervous. But… Well…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Oh, come on! Even in this situation, I can't just give up the match like that. Come on, me!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: I know that I'm just a small part of the big picture, but today I'll give it my best shot…!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: That's what I'm talking about! Let's go, let's go!!

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text: The competitors have lined up at the start! A race like this has never been seen before! Who will be the one to take home the glory of first!?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I figured you would be here.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Oh? Don't tell me you're stargazing now?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Ha ha. I just came to give my thanks. Thanks to you, we were able to make a phenomenal pamphlet.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: You don't need to thank me. I was just doing it to have a bit of fun.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Once again, when the race ended a lot of different things happened. The person who took home the glory. Those who were unable to grasp it…

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Dear friends and rivals were able to come together to compete. Their different ideologies clashed with each other.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Those who stand at the top were able to face those who sought to make their way there. The day where they can give those at the top a hearty challenge will come eventually.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: And those who stand strong with an unwavering heart that looks towards an unknown future one step at a time.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: If anything, it is the students of Tracen Academy that are "high-spirited." I hope it will remain that way moving forward.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: It was by creating the pamphlet that I was able to finally realize the true nature of our school.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: And that's why I love this place.

text_block_list.name: Pamphlet-reading Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: How pretty! The school seems so fun and brilliant! I want to run there one day…!!

text_block_list.name: Pamphlet-reading Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: They also seem free to express themselves. If I worked hard and got in, I wonder if I can do many different things like that…

text_block_list.name: Pamphlet-reading Horsegirl C
text_block_list.text: Wow! Wow! Wow! I want to run in a race just like this!!

text_block_list.name: Hopeful Horsegirls
text_block_list.text: I want to make it there……!!

text_block_list.name: Hopeful Horsegirls
text_block_list.text: I want to run there!!

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Yes. I can feel it.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: That was the gust of a new wind. From someone I have yet to meet. That was a wind from the future.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Sorry to keep you waiting, C.B.!

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: No, not at all. Well then, let's begin.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Of course! Today I won't lose!!

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Yes. Same here.

text_block_list.name: C.B. & Ace
text_block_list.text: Ready, go!!
